mapper.update: UPDATE devops_env de set de.devops_env_group_id = null where de.id = #{envId}
UPDATE devops_env de set de.saga_sync_commit = #{sagaSyncCommit} where de.id = #{envId}
UPDATE devops_env de set de.devops_sync_commit = #{devopsSyncCommit} where de.id = #{envId}
UPDATE devops_env de set de.agent_sync_commit = #{agentSyncCommit} where de.id = #{envId}
mapper.select: select * from devops_env de where de.token = #{token}

SELECT de.gitlab_env_project_id FROM devops_env de JOIN devops_project dp ON dp.devops_env_group_id = #{gitlabGroupId} AND dp.iam_project_id = de.project_id JOIN devops_env_user_permission deup ON deup.env_id = de.id AND deup.iam_user_id = #{iamUserId}
